STEPS.TITLE: An optimized and transparent recruitment process
STEPS.SUBTITLE: A structured path to success!
STEPS.DESCRIPTION: We have developed a rigorous and efficient approach to support you at every stage, offering you all the necessary guarantees to apply with confidence and determination.

STEPS_LIST.TITLE: Fill out the form
STEPS_LIST.DESCRIPTION: Simply fill out the form online and upload your CV, a quick and secure process.

STEPS_LIST.TITLE: Profile analysis
STEPS_LIST.DESCRIPTION: We review your profile to ensure it matches the position you've chosen, taking into account your skills and experiences.

STEPS_LIST.TITLE: Interview
STEPS_LIST.DESCRIPTION: A phone interview will allow us to get to know you, followed by a video interview to further discuss the exchange.

STEPS_LIST.TITLE: Validation and connection
STEPS_LIST.DESCRIPTION: Once the process is validated, we will connect you with the company to finalize your recruitment.

EXPERTISE.TITLE: Recognized expertise
EXPERTISE.DESCRIPTION: With a specialization in the tech and recruitment sector, we understand the needs of companies and candidates to ensure a perfect match.

SIMPLICITY.TITLE: Simplicity and speed
SIMPLICITY.DESCRIPTION: Our intuitive platform and streamlined process help save time while ensuring high-quality results.

SUPPORT.TITLE: Personalized support
SUPPORT.DESCRIPTION: We are by your side at every step, offering advice and tailored guidance to maximize your chances of success.

FAQ.TITLE: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.SUBTITLE: Find quick answers to your questions

FAQITEMS.QUESTION: Can I apply for multiple job offers at the same time?
FAQITEMS.ANSWER: Yes, you can apply to as many job offers as you want, as long as your profile matches the job requirements.

FAQITEMS.QUESTION: How do I know if my CV has been received?
FAQITEMS.ANSWER: After submitting your CV, you will be redirected to a confirmation page that ensures your application has been successfully sent. If we need additional information, we will contact you directly.

FAQITEMS.QUESTION: What happens after the interview?
FAQITEMS.ANSWER: After the interview, we review the collected information and inform you promptly about the next steps, connecting you with the company if you are selected.

FAQITEMS.QUESTION: What should I do if I encounter a technical issue during my application?
FAQITEMS.ANSWER: If you experience technical issues, our support team is available to assist you. You can contact us through our social media channels: Instagram and Facebook.
